name: StylizedDrift - 3D Drift Game
description:
StylizedDrift

Download StylizedDrift and drift alone or with friends around the perfect drift routes today.

Why StylizedDrift

Pure gameplay.
No in-app purchases, no advertising.  -  100% free
Developed in 1 year by CyberTimon

Multiplayer

Don't play alone!
StylizedDrift has computer-controlled opponents or up to 20 multiplayer players.

Drift Physics

No matter if you are a beginner or an experienced drifter. It's very easy to drift in StylizedDrift.

Car Library

In StylizedDrift there are over 45 playable cars with which you can drift across the streets.

Updates

StylizedDrift is in beta and is constantly being updated.
If there is something that you don't like or is missing, contact me at: timon@cybertimon.ch

Over 15 Drift Routes

There are over 15 maps in StylizedDrift, 9 of which are derived from real life. Including:
-Nürnburgring
-Spa-Francorchamps
-Laguna Seca 
-Interlacos
-Imola
And much more.
